website_summaries.verdict: Tremendous capacity and unrivaled versatility for the outdoor cooking enthusiast.
pros: With 1,260 square inches of cooking space, 3 gas burners, a side burner, and a charcoal grill, this has a huge amount of cooking area, however you like to grill
Grates are top-quality porcelain-coated cast iron, and are easy to clean
cons: Inconsistent finishing means some suffer with rust

customer_reviews.title: So this is False Advertising at its finest!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This grill is advertised as being model # 5050 however you will receive model #5650 which is sold everywhere at $250. As seen in the picture description this grill should contain a metal rack beneath and it does not! So when you contact amazon they say they do not sell the model #5650. Leaving no option other than a refund! So after fully assembling my brand new grill, I can not use it and I have to wait to be refunded! So this is False Advertising at its finest!
customer_reviews.author: Juniorkv

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality!
customer_reviews.text: After 2 years keeping the grill covered and occasionally using it during the weekends only, today while moving it the whole bottom fall as if it is rotten. The same happened with the internal covers of the burners. Overall super bad quality. It’s a pitty evacuase it is a great concept to have the dual option but is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Grau

customer_reviews.title: Its ok.
customer_reviews.text: I guess for $300 for both it's ok but I've had mine for 4 years with occasional use and covered it still rusted away. I now have to buy new flame covers and a grill top. The grill is flimsy and made cheap. This is the reason for how cheap the price is.
customer_reviews.author: EXP10

customer_reviews.title: Great grill, great price for everything you get, love the duo cooking options
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES his grill! He brags about it all the time lol. We love having the option to have charcoal grilled steaks/chicken but being able to just turn on our grill and make something using the propane saves our dinner a LOT. Also, living on the east coast this was such a sigh of relief with this last hurricane, we knew we would still be able to cook and cook something we enjoy because of this grill if our power went out!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Maharg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BBQ - spent many a weekend in front of ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome BBQ - spent many a weekend in front of it. Even used in winter during snow. Love it - expecting great use this summer as well. Putting it together you may need two people but once together easily moved. We bought the cover for this as well and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. He loves it. He was able to put it together in about 4 hours by himself with no problems. It was delivered to my home and handled with great care. We were very pleased with the entire transition, delivery, and quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am not a good griller so I gave to my daughter she loves ...
customer_reviews.text: The smoker attachment seems flemsy, but it stays on. I am not a good griller so I gave to my daughter she loves this four in one char grill. Not for wimpy grillers like me back to infrared grills
customer_reviews.author: veronique Brown

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon for rectifying this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's housewarming and had it sent directly to him. (He lives 4.5-5 hrs away from us) When he started unboxing it, he found the parts were bent. Being determined to continue with unboxing and assembling, he continued. As he finished unboxing, he found more pieces either bent, scraped, or broken. I called Amazon to let them know. They told me to have him box it and they'll exchange. He did not want to go through and repackage so he hammered and worked with it to make it work. After a couple more Amazon calls, we came to an agreeable solution. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful grill. Easy assembly with very good instructions
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful grill. Easy assembly with very good instructions. We use it almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Parker

customer_reviews.title: smokey treats!
customer_reviews.text: showed up missing parts and couldn't great parts. I returned it but Char Grillers r great BBQ's this would of been my 3rd. I went to Home Depot and bought a 5650
customer_reviews.author: Gunny

customer_reviews.title: Very Good quality
customer_reviews.text: It came in a lot of pieces. took 2 hours to fully assemble. directions and labels were very specific. Looks great and is sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! Works great, hasn't gotten rusty yet (which happens quick in Florida) We love it.

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill I Have Owned

customer_reviews.title: XPO lost it in transit
customer_reviews.text: I wish i would have received this grill - I was sent the 5030 as this one was sold out. Char Grill makes awesome grills. heavy duty but not complicated to assemble - looking forward to adding the fire box to turn it in to a smoker too.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grill and a great value Easy to assemble

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.text: Can not say enough about this product and the sellers. They did an awesome job getting this to us. Looking forward to getting to some great use out of this product next grilling season.

customer_reviews.title: Two ways to go !
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine piece of cooking equipment. It was easy to assemble and sturdy. If you want a good combo cooker without spend thousand, it here.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful installing the gauges. Do not over tighten

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Awesome

It was a project to put together especially since the screws and such were every where in the box. Box also had a lot of holes and we were unsure that some of the parts were even in the box. But all in all the grill is great!!

customer_reviews.text: Grill was easy to assemble. The heat on the gas grille is easy to control. I have not tried the charcoal yet,but I am sure it will work well because of its design.

customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly and super easy to use. Almost fool proof! My husband fired this grill up an hour after I put it together and it worked like a dream!

customer_reviews.text: We have had this for several years now and it still cooks great! Invest in the cover, it will keep it much nicer!

customer_reviews.title: ... the past years but this is one of the best. The only downside was that I over paid ...
customer_reviews.text: I have several grills over the past years but this is one of the best. The only downside was that I over paid for this grill on Home Depot was 60 less. Oh well next time I need to check prices.

customer_reviews.text: The weld broke on one of the hinge brackets. I epoxied it back on with some JB high heat. So far it's holding.

customer_reviews.title: Product damaged

We had to literally use a hammer and other tools to get pieces unbent. When I called the manufacturer they blamed the damage on Amazon. I told them they were incorrect.

customer_reviews.title: but it doesn't change the way how good the food taste
customer_reviews.text: The grill had a few dents from the FACTORY, but it doesn't change the way how good the food taste. Thank you for taking the damaged one back and getting me a brand new one sent to me in a timely manner. I can't wait to make my next steak "moo" when I make it.

product_meta.title: Char-Griller 5050 Duo Gas-and-Charcoal Grill
product_meta.description: Enjoy quick gas grilling during the week and slow charcoal cooking on the weekends with the all-in-one Char-Griller Duo 5050 Grill. The Char-Griller Duo provides 1,260 sq.in. of BBQ grilling and smoking space. The gas grill side features 438 sq.in. cooking area, porcelain coated cast iron grates, dual smoke stacks for even heating, 3 burners with 40,800 BTU output, electronic ignition, and a 12,000 BTU side burner. The charcoal side features 580 sq.in. cooking area, warming rack, adjustable fire grate with easy dump ash pan and a double lined bottom. Heavy steel construction for durability and two fuel options for convenience and flavor. For Texas smoking add the 2-2424 side firebox (not included).
feature_bullets: Charcoal and gas grill combo with 1260 square inches of cooking space
40,800 BTU gas grill with electronic ignition and 3 burners, 12,000 BTU side burner
Adjustable grate height for temperature control; chrome-plated warming rack
Stainless-steel heat gauge; porcelain-coated cast-iron grates; easy-dump ash pan

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars299 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
